channel.title: Grove City College - Hicks Menu RSS Feed

item.title: Mon, 13 May 2013
item.description:
Lunch

[Soup] Chicken & Wild Rice Soup 

[Wolf Creek Grill] Burgers/ Hot & Spicy Burger/ Grilled Portabellas/ Fresh Cut Fries/Sweet Potato Fries 

[Toss & Sauce] Cheese, Pepperoni & Specialty Pizzas/ Asst Pastas/ Marinara or Roasted Garlic w/ Red Pepper Cream Sauces/ Smoked Turkey w/ Toasted Walnuts on Romaine Lettuce w/ Chipotle Ranch 

[Wok Zone] Hunan Beef & Vegetables w/ Jasmine & Brown Rice & Lo Mein 

[Rotisserie Cuts] Chicken Fajitas/ Tex-Mex Brown Rice/ Pinto Beans 

[Homestyle] Burgers/ Shells & Cheese/ Fresh Cut Fries/ Stewed Tomatoes/ Fresh Vegetable 

Dinner

[Soup] Chicken & Wild Rice Soup 

[Wolf Creek Grill] Sausage Gravy & Biscuits/ Scrambled Cheesy Eggs/ Breakfast Potatoes/ Peaches w/ Whipped Topping 

[Toss & Sauce] Assorted Pizzas & Pastas/ Marinara Sauce/ Farmer's Market Chicken w/ White & Wheat Pasta 

[Wok Zone] Korean Beef & Vegetables w/ Jasmine & White Rice & Lo Mein 

[Rotisserie Cuts] Chili Spiced BBQ Pork Loin/ Oven Roasted Potatoes/ Applesauce/ Fresh Vegetable 

[Homestyle] Italian Bar/ Grilled Italian Vegetables/ Garlic Rolls/ Italian Salad/ Fresh Vegetable

item.title: Tue, 14 May 2013
item.description:
Lunch

[Toss & Sauce] Cheese, Pepperoni & Specialty Pizzas/ Asst Pastas/ Marinara or Sun-dried Tomato & Chicken Sauces/ Creamy Curried Chicken Salad w/ Wild Rice

[Homestyle] Taco Nacho Bar w/ Spanish Rice, Refried Beans & Tri-colored Chips & Salsa

[Soup] Cheesy Potato Soup 

[Wolf Creek Grill] Apple Pancakes/ Sausage Links/ Breakfast Potatoes/ Cinnamon Applesauce
